message: Let's get this started! I'm willing to give you a good chunk of change, but I'm hoping to get the majority.
You're starting strong, but I'm not giving up yet! Time to make a move!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make this worthwhile. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not backing down. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect it to last!
I'm not getting any younger, and I need a bigger share to make this worth my while. Take it or leave it!
It's getting late, and I'm not going to let you walk all over me. 50/50, take it or leave it!
